mapper.select: select * from t_theme left join t_user on t_theme.n_user_id=t_user.n_id left join t_theme_reply on t_theme.n_id=t_theme_reply.n_theme_id where n_theme_class in (select c1.n_id from t_theme_class c1 inner join t_theme_class c2 on c1.n_parentId = c2.n_id where c2.n_id=#{tabsId}) order by t_theme_reply.d_reply_time desc

select t_theme.n_id theme_n_id, t_theme.c_theme_title theme_c_theme_title, t_user.n_id user_n_id,t_user.c_username,t_user.c_avatar user_c_avatar, reply.n_id themeReply_n_id,reply.d_reply_time themeReply_d_reply_time, count(*) countReply from t_theme left join t_user on t_theme.n_user_id=t_user.n_id left join (SELECT * from t_theme_reply order by d_reply_time desc) reply on t_theme.n_id=reply.n_theme_id where n_theme_class = #{nodeId} GROUP BY t_theme.n_id order by t_theme.d_create_time desc ,reply.d_reply_time desc
